abilities.description: Grants the user human-level intelligence and the ability to speak human language. When consumed by an animal, allows them to think and communicate like a human while retaining their animal instincts.
The user's natural reindeer form, maintaining the ability to walk on four legs with enhanced intelligence.
A hybrid human-reindeer form with an enlarged head and small body, optimized for thinking and strategizing.
A full human form transformation that makes Chopper appear as a large, muscular humanoid reindeer with significant physical strength.

weaknesses.description: User cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

reveals.information: The Hito Hito no Mi grants Chopper the ability to transform into Heavy Point, a large muscular humanoid form
Chopper's consumption of this fruit made him even more of an outcast, as he was already rejected for his blue nose and the transformation made him scary to both reindeer and humans
The fruit granted Chopper human speech and intelligence, allowing him to learn medicine from Dr. Kureha

historicalSignificance: One of the few Devil Fruits shown to fundamentally transform an animal's cognitive abilities, granting full human intelligence and communication skills. The Hito Hito no Mi is particularly unique for making an animal capable of learning complex skills like advanced medicine.

keyMoments.title: Devil Fruit Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: Dr. Kureha explains to Nami that Chopper ate the Hito Hito no Mi, which is why he can speak and transform.
keyMoments.significance: First time the fruit is explicitly named and explained to the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Heavy Point Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Chopper transforms into Heavy Point to stop Luffy and Sanji from closing a door, protecting baby birds nesting there.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Heavy Point transformation to the Straw Hats.
